sqltable.query: select * from tuitionCalc order by tuitionCalcId

sqlquery.query: input INTO tuitionCalc (base12CoursePrice, base34CoursePrice, nonResUnderAdd, credReq, doublePerSem, singlePerSem, apartSinglePerSem, apartDoublePerSem, doubleSinglePerSem, postGradCoursePrice, nonResGradAdd, addFeePerSem, mealPlan0, mealPlan1, mealPlan2, mealPlan3, mealPlan4 mealPlan5, mealPlan6, natAveInPerSem, natAveOutPerSem, natAveOtherPerSem) VALUES ('&form.base12CoursePrice:sql;', '&form.base34CoursePrice:sql;', '&form.nonResUnderAdd:sql;','&form.credReq:sql;', '&form.doublePerSem:sql;','&form.singlePerSem:sql;', '&form.apartSinglePerSem:sql;', '&form.apartDoublePerSem:sql;', '&form.doubleSinglePerSem:sql;', '&form.postGradCoursePrice:sql;', '&form.nonResGradAdd:sql;', '&form.addFeePerSem:sql;', '&form.mealPlan0:sql;', '&form.mealPlan1:sql;', '&form.mealPlan2:sql;', '&form.mealPlan3:sql;', '&form.mealPlan4:sql;', '&form.mealPlan5:sql;', '&form.mealPlan6:sql;', '&form.natAveInPerSem:sql;', '&form.natAveOutPerSem:sql;','&form.natAveOtherPerSem:sql;')
